rules_text:
Third Act [i](If your life total is less than half of your starting life total or if you have one or fewer cards in hand, you enter the Third Act for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Counter target spell. If you're in your third act, exile its controller's graveyard. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast cards exiled this way and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast them.
